thread.title: Grateful Dead, John Mayer giving away 10K tickets to NY show
thread.title_full: Grateful Dead, John Mayer giving away 10K tickets to NY show

title: Grateful Dead, John Mayer giving away 10K tickets to NY show
text:
> Entertainment Grateful Dead, John Mayer giving away 10K tickets to NY show FILE - In this April 23, 2014 file photo, musician Bob Weir performs at the premiere of "The Other One: The Long, Strange Trip of Bob Weir" during the 2014 Tribeca Film Festival in New York. Members of the Grateful Dead and John Mayer are giving 10,000 free tickets to their concert next month. (Photo by Evan Agostini/Invision/AP, File) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
